mapper.select: SELECT* FROM COCKTAIL C JOIN COCKTAIL_SRC CS ON(CS.COCKTAIL_NO=C.NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (C.MEMBER_NO=M.NO) WHERE M.NO=#{memberNo} ORDER BY C.NO , CS.FILE_NAME DESC

SELECT * FROM BOOKMARK B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.MEMBER_NO=M.NO) LEFT JOIN COCKTAIL C ON (C.NO=B.COCKTAIL_NO) LEFT JOIN COCKTAIL_SRC CS ON(CS.COCKTAIL_NO=C.NO) WHERE B.MEMBER_NO= #{memberNo} ORDER BY C.NO , CS.FILE_NAME DESC
